title: Drawing, "Helena Rubinstein Apartment: Chest, Three Drawers, Low, Attached Curved Front Panel, Long Rectangular Pulls-Curved on Left", 1930
medium: Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamped in black ink at upper right and lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ ASSOCIATES
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: [Deskey #] 7401/ RUBIN; in red color pencil, P
description: Small dresser with three long, rectangular drawers. Rectinilear on left of dresser, rounded panel on right side. Long rectangular pulls, curved on left side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Helena Rubinstein Apartment: Chest, Three Drawers, Low, Attached Curved Front Panel, Long Rectangular Pulls-Curved on Left", 1930.
1930. Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1794.
